patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses: We sell nothing here.

I said to the Gym instructor: 'Can you tech me to do the splits?' 
 He said, ' How flexible are you?' I said: 'I can't make Tuesdays.'
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

patterns: I'd like to know the weather.
responses: I have no idea, you should just ask the weather man.
It may be sunny, but it is also likely to rain.
